item.description: @MarcusCrede If they have open data (and it's not too big a task), you can redo the analysis correctly as a model and send them that with an explanation of how this analysis improves their original one. This makes it clear you intend to be helpful, not just critical.

item.title: #en @ 1504064644419362821
item.description: The CCP's social contract is simple - give up your liberty for security. We have created a world where that model can easily be adopted in democracies. Fear surrounding Covid made it appealing to the masses. Our open data model made the move seamless. We must think differently.
